oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: The Eddy Arnold Show - #009
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The Eddy Arnold Show #9, produced and transcribed in Nashville, TN. by Brown Radio Productions. Featuring Eddy Arnold and the Tennessee Plowboys, the Willis Brothers (introduced as the Oklahoma Wranglers), Roy Wiggins, and host 'Pappy' Hal Horton. Opening theme music, 'Cattle Call'; closing theme music, 'Boil Them Cabbage Down'.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Eddy Arnold; Tennessee Plowboys; Willis Brothers; Oklahoma Wranglers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Hal Horton) -- Opening theme -- Opening statement (Eddy Arnold) -- Easy Rockin' Chair (Eddy Arnold) -- Hal Horton and Eddy Arnold talk -- No Children Allowed (Eddy Arnold) -- Hal Horton and Eddy Arnold introduce the Oklahoma Wranglers -- Have I Told You Lately That I Love You? (Oklahoma Wranglers) -- Eddy Arnold talks -- She'll Be Coming 'Round The Mountain (Skeeter Willis fiddle) -- Hal Horton talks -- I Walk Alone (Eddy Arnold) -- Closing statement (Eddy Arnold) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Hal Horton)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Eddy Arnold Show (Radio program); Horton, Hal, -1948; Arnold, Eddy, 1918-2008; Tennessee Plowboys; Wiggins, Roy; Oklahoma Wranglers (Musical group); Willis Brothers; Willis, Skeeter, -1976
